title: Friendly Lion
description: Draw a friendly lion step-by-step using onion-skin overlays to guide shapes, details, and shading.

onion_skin.svg:
<svg viewBox='0 0 300 300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='150' cy='130' r='60' fill='none' stroke='#9fd' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='6 6'/>
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='210' rx='80' ry='40' fill='none' stroke='#9fd' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='6 6'/>
</svg>

hint_tiers.text: Block in the head (circle) and body (ellipse). Keep lines light.
Center the head above the body; let the ellipse overlap a bit.
Watch a quick demo of sketching the base shapes.

onion_skin.svg:
<svg viewBox='0 0 300 300' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <circle cx='130' cy='120' r='8' fill='#9fd'/>
  <circle cx='170' cy='120' r='8' fill='#9fd'/>
  <path d='M140 145 Q150 155 160 145' fill='none' stroke='#9fd' stroke-width='3' stroke-linecap='round'/>
  <path d='M150 70 C90 110 90 190 150 230' fill='none' stroke='#cfe' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='5 7'/>
  <path d='M150 70 C210 110 210 190 150 230' fill='none' stroke='#cfe' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='5 7'/>
</svg>

hint_tiers.text: Add eyes and a small smile. Keep them centered.
Sketch a soft mane around the head using long curves.
Preview a demo to see eye spacing and mane rhythm.
Lay in flat color for head and body.
Use a large brush for smooth fills; avoid gaps.
Watch a demo on efficient flat fill.
Add soft shadows under the head and across the body.
Keep shadows on the lower-right sides for a top-left light.
View a demo on feathered shading.

hint_tiers.text: Add whiskers, eye highlights, and a ground curve.
